name: MainTainVerse
description:
The Multiverse is threatened by an evil force, and the artifact that could save all the worlds is in pieces. Fight your way through three worlds to gather the pieces back together and save the multiverse. 

This is a submission to 2020 Assembly Game Jam.

Credits:
